docs.title: 橙网
docs.text: 一个致力于公益的 Minecraft 群组服务器运维组织。

docs.title: 我们所提供的服务
docs.text: 我们提供服务器物理主机、域名解析、网络加速及运维辅助等全方位技术支持。你所畅玩的每一片世界，背后都离不开我们的默默支撑。

docs.title: 我们为何需要你的支持
docs.text:
成本逐年上升

随着运营商对部分线路网络策略的持续调整，我们不得不购置新的服务器，以应对由此引发的高延迟、高丢包问题。这部分成本正逐年上升，已难以仅靠成员自费承担。

因此，我们需要来自玩家的支持，共同维护一个更加稳定、可玩的网络环境。

docs.title: 为什么你可以相信我们
docs.text: 优势 说明 技术方案 橙网始终坚持采用成本更低、效果更优的技术方案 资金监管 所有支出均接受众筹委员会的严格监管，确保资金使用透明、杜绝挪用 合作经验 橙网还与寿司峰公益组织携手，稳定运维多个服务器多年，积累了丰富的经验与信誉

docs.title: 你的资金将用于哪些方面
docs.text:
1. 云服务相关支出
  2. 物理服务器的维护与维修

欢迎捐款

欢迎各位以个人或者服务器名义向我们捐款。

docs.title: Orange Network
docs.text: A nonprofit-oriented Minecraft group server operation organization.

docs.title: Our Services
docs.text: We provide comprehensive technical support including server hardware, domain resolution, network acceleration, and operational assistance. Every world you play is backed by our unwavering support.

docs.title: Why We Need Your Support
docs.text:
Rising Costs

As ISPs continue to adjust network policies for certain routes, we've been forced to purchase new servers to address the resulting high latency and packet loss issues. These costs are increasing yearly and can no longer be covered by members alone.

Therefore, we need support from players to maintain a more stable and enjoyable network environment.

docs.title: Why You Can Trust Us
docs.text: Advantage Description Technical Solutions Orange Network consistently adopts lower-cost, more effective technical solutions Fund Oversight All expenditures are strictly supervised by the crowdfunding committee, ensuring transparent fund usage and preventing misappropriation Partnership Experience Orange Network has partnered with Sushi Peak nonprofit organization to stably operate multiple servers for years, accumulating rich experience and credibility

docs.title: Where Your Funds Will Go
docs.text:
1. Cloud service related expenses
  2. Physical server maintenance and repairs

Donations Welcome

We welcome donations from individuals or servers.
